name: dazzling
effect: When an opposing Pokémon attempts to use a move that targets this Pokémon or an ally, and that move has priority, it will fail.
short_effect: Opposing Pokémon cannot use priority attacks.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
Surprises the opposing Pokémon, making it unable
to attack using priority moves.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
Surprises the opposing Pokémon, making it unable
to attack using priority moves.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
Surprises the opposing Pokémon, making it unable
to attack using priority moves.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
Surprises the opposing Pokémon, making it unable
to attack using priority moves.
flavor_text_entries.scarlet-violet: The Pokémon dazzles its opponents, making them unable to use priority moves against the Pokémon or its allies.
